body.p: Mibble is an open-source SNMP MIB parser (or SMI parser) written in Java. The Mibble library contains classes for easy access to all the information in the MIB file, including OIDs, type data and descriptions. A couple of useful applications are also bundled with Mibble, among them a MIB browser with a simple SNMP manager. Detailed information is available in the feature list.
See the Mibble web site or the Github project page for the latest version or updates.
The documents below are the release notes for Mibble version ():

item.text: Instructions for installing and running Mibble.
List of features supported in this version.
Acknowledgements of persons and organizations that have contributed to Mibble.
